requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (32bit)
  • Processor: Core2 Duo T9400 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA 4500mhd or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (32bit)
  • Processor: Core2 Quad q6600 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4400 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible
